forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. E winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High near 50F. ENE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly this evening. Low 3C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 44F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 42F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow late. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 38F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.
